entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmpb8k8s6nk/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0055.7493] Neither the Domestic Plan [Member] NOR Foreign Plan [Member] has been used on the Retirement Plan Sponsor Location [Axis] in the presentation linkbase http://usg.com/role/EmployeeRetirementPlansNarrativeDetails. The FASB requires that either one or both of these members is present on the Retirement Plan Sponsor Location [Axis]. Please review the axis and add one of these members or assess the need to use the Retirement Plan Sponsor Location [Axis].
The axis RetirementPlanSponsorLocationAxis has the following members listed under it: country:CA, us-gaap:RetirementPlanSponsorLocationDomain, country:US
Rule Element Id:7493 Rule version: 7.0.0RC6 -
